name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 with Stimulus Package
name_original: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 with Stimulus Package
description:
Download and play the multiple Game of the Year award-winner Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare® 2. Experience gripping and heart-racing action as you face off against a new threat dedicated to bringing the world to the brink of collapse. The Modern Warfare 2 Stimulus Package delivers 5 additional action-packed multiplayer maps, including brand-new battlegrounds and legendary fan-favorites from Call of Duty® 4: Modern Warfare™.


Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service).
